top.description: offset from the top, including units

left.description: offset from the left, including units; or 'auto'

maxWidth.description: maximium width of the window contents including units, such as '200px'

maxHeight.description: maximium height of the window contents including units, such as '200px'

title.description: window title, or null for none

contents.description: array of contents, or null for none

okButton.description: true  or false to render default window ok button ( false by default)

okButtonOnClick.description: handler for ok button onClick event

applyButton.description: true  or false to render default window apply button ( false by default)

applyButtonOnClick.description: handler for apply button onClick event

cancelButton.description: true  or false to render default window cancel button ( false by default)

cancelButtonOnClick.description: handler for cancel button onClick event

closeButton.description: true  or false to render default window close button ( true by default)

closeButtonOnClick.description: handler for close button onClick event
